title: Multiply by the Conjugate
text: Multiply the numerator and denominator by the congugate of the denominator $$2-\left(+\sqrt{3}\right)$$
speech: Multiply the numerator and denominator by the congugate of the denominator ; 2 minus, open paren, positive the square root of 3; close paren;

title: Simplify
text: Simplify the denominator as much as possible
speech: Simplify the denominator as much as possible

title: Remove common factors
text: Remove the common factors of the numerator and denominator by dividing them out.
speech: Remove the common factors of the numerator and denominator by dividing them out.

title: Answer
speech: The answer is ; 5 times, open paren, 2 plus the square root of 3; close paren; .
